name: The Hootenanny's Quest
description:
Introducing the newest game to the Negative Zero universe! The very first Hootenanny game is here for the free enjoyment of all. Play as newly hired maid Heather as she shows up for her first day of work and discovers what all a general use maid is expected to do. In case you want to know it's fetching items so the Hootenanny can create a game. So come try it out and see if free is a good price or not. 
*2D RPG gaming!
*Banter for those of you that like that sort of things.
* Special attacks involving brooms and bopping foes with said broom.
